pytenno.models.itemsÔÉÅ

class pytenno.models.items.ItemCommon(*, id: str, url_name: str, icon: str, icon_format: Optional[IconFormat] = None, sub_icon: Optional[str] = None, thumb: str, tags: list[str], mod_max_rank: Optional[int] = None, subtypes: Optional[list[pytenno.models.enums.Subtype]] = None, cyan_stars: Optional[int] = None, amber_stars: Optional[int] = None, ducats: Optional[int] = None)[source]ÔÉÅ

Common base class that an item can inherit from.

Parameters

  • id (str) ‚Äì The ID of the item.

  • url_name (str) ‚Äì The URL name of the item.

  • icon (str) ‚Äì The URL of the item‚Äôs icon.

  • icon_format (IconFormat) ‚Äì The format of the item‚Äôs icon.

  • sub_icon (str , optional) ‚Äì The URL of the item‚Äôs sub icon. For example if the item is part of a set, icon will the icon of the set, while sub_icon will be the icon of the item in the set.

  • thumb (str) ‚Äì The URL of the item‚Äôs thumbnail.

  • tags (list[str]) ‚Äì The tags of the item.

  • mod_max_rank (int) ‚Äì The maximum rank of the item. SOON TO BE: max_rank

  • subtypes (list[Subtype] , optional) ‚Äì The subtypes of the item.

  • cyan_stars (int) ‚Äì The number of cyan stars the item has.

  • amber_stars (int) ‚Äì The number of amber stars the item has.

  • ducats (int) ‚Äì The ducat worth of the item.

class pytenno.models.items.ItemFull(*, id: str, url_name: str, icon: str, icon_format: Optional[IconFormat] = None, sub_icon: Optional[str] = None, thumb: str, tags: list[str], mod_max_rank: Optional[int] = None, subtypes: Optional[list[pytenno.models.enums.Subtype]] = None, cyan_stars: Optional[int] = None, amber_stars: Optional[int] = None, ducats: Optional[int] = None, en: LangInItem, ru: LangInItem, ko: LangInItem, fr: LangInItem, de: LangInItem, sv: LangInItem, zh_hant: LangInItem, zh_hans: LangInItem, pt: LangInItem, es: LangInItem, pl: LangInItem, set_root: bool, mastery_level: int, rarity: Optional[ItemRarity] = None, trading_tax: int, quantity_for_set: Optional[int] = None)[source]ÔÉÅ

same as ItemInOrder, but lang related fields contain more infos, + rarity, set_root, MR, trading tax.

Parameters

  • id (str) ‚Äì The ID of the item.

  • url_name (str) ‚Äì The URL name of the item.

  • icon (str) ‚Äì The URL of the item‚Äôs icon.

  • icon_format (IconFormat) ‚Äì The format of the item‚Äôs icon.

  • sub_icon (str , optional) ‚Äì The URL of the item‚Äôs sub icon. For example if the item is part of a set, icon will the icon of the set, while sub_icon will be the icon of the item in the set.

  • thumb (str) ‚Äì The URL of the item‚Äôs thumbnail.

  • tags (list[str]) ‚Äì The tags of the item.

  • mod_max_rank (int) ‚Äì The maximum rank of the item. SOON TO BE: max_rank

  • subtypes (list[Subtype] , optional) ‚Äì The subtypes of the item.

  • cyan_stars (int) ‚Äì The number of cyan stars the item has.

  • amber_stars (int) ‚Äì The number of amber stars the item has.

  • ducats (int) ‚Äì The ducat worth of the item.

  • set_root (bool) ‚Äì Whether the item is part of a set.

  • mastery_level (int) ‚Äì The mastery level of the item.

  • rarity (ItemRarity , optional) ‚Äì The rarity of the item. If None, the item does not have any specific rarity.

  • trading_tax (int) ‚Äì The trading tax of the item.

  • quantity_for_set (int , optional) ‚Äì The quantity of the item required to obtain the set.

  • en (LangInItem) ‚Äì The english language of the item.

  • ru (LangInItem) ‚Äì The russian language of the item.

  • ko (LangInItem) ‚Äì The korean language of the item.

  • fr (LangInItem) ‚Äì The french language of the item.

  • de (LangInItem) ‚Äì The german language of the item.

  • sv (LangInItem) ‚Äì The swedish language of the item.

  • zh_hant (LangInItem) ‚Äì The chinese traditional language of the item.

  • zh_hans (LangInItem) ‚Äì The chinese simplified language of the item.

  • pt (LangInItem) ‚Äì The portuguese language of the item.

  • es (LangInItem) ‚Äì The spanish language of the item.

  • pl (LangInItem) ‚Äì The polish language of the item.

class pytenno.models.items.LangInItem(item_name: str, description: str, wiki_link: str | None, drop: list[pytenno.models.droptable.Drop])[source]ÔÉÅ

Parameters

  • wiki_link (str , optional) ‚Äì The link to the wiki page of the item.
